name: GAME OVER (itch) (ALumpySofa)
description:
GAME OVER is an interactive text adventure made using the Twine software.

Discover what has happened to you. Explore the video game afterlife. Choose where you want to go.

Feedback is always welcomed. You can Tweet your thoughts on GAME OVER by using my Twitter handle: @alumpysofa

Thank you and I hope that you enjoy the experience.
